law.catch_line: Preliminary revocation hearings of probation, parole, and postincarceration supervision violators.
law.text: Preliminary revocation hearings of probation, parole, and postincarceration supervision violators shall be conducted by hearing officers. These hearing officers shall be attorneys, appointed by the board and admitted to practice in Kentucky, who shall perform the aforementioned duties and any others assigned by the board.
law.history: Amended 2011 Ky. Acts ch.2, sec.88, effective March 3, 2011. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 259, sec. 3, effective June 17, 1978.
